General.Name: Radiant Innovation
General.Description: Radiant Innovation Inc. designs and develops infrared technology products. It offers ear and forehead thermometers, and other body temperature measurement products; and infrared precision thermometers, carbon dioxide detectors, infrared precision thermal imaging cameras, and other instruments. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Industrial East 9th Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
